Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2007 07:09PM tigerpink wrote: hello i am new here.  i am worried sick, my husband is in another country right now no family close i needed to let these feelings out.  i have a reddened area above my nipple. it is not tender, my breast is very fibrous and always has so i can't notice any new lumps. the reddened area has been there for probably a week or so and hasn't changed.  i just saw on the internet about inflammatory breast cancer and it scares me. tomorrow i am going to see the doctor but i am so worried sick now.  my breasts aren't swollen or tender but the red area has me worried.  please help me!!!
